info.author: Egor V. Nazarkin, Vitaliy Kucheraviy
info.description:
===========
Django table prefix
===========

django-table-prefix provides experimental ability to set your own
database table prefixes for django project this app is included in
Include this app into your project's settings.py, provide table prefix
name and list of models (optional) for ommiting prefix usage::

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
        ... # your regular stuff
        'table_prefix',
    )

    # table prefix name
    DB_PREFIX = 'nifty_prefix'

    # omit prefixing tables for these models
    OMIT_MODELS = (
        '<app_name>.<model class name>',
    )
info.name: django-table-prefix
info.summary: experimental application for making table prefixes fortables that django creates
info.html_description:
===========
Django table prefix
===========

django-table-prefix provides experimental ability to set your own
database table prefixes for django project this app is included in
Include this app into your project's settings.py, provide table prefix
name and list of models (optional) for ommiting prefix usage::

INSTALLED_APPS = (
... # your regular stuff
'table_prefix',
)

# table prefix name
DB_PREFIX = 'nifty_prefix'

# omit prefixing tables for these models
OMIT_MODELS = (
'<app_name>.<model class name>',
)
